channel.title: 202 Jokes of Mulla Nasrudin on Osho - The complete works of Osho
channel.description: Recent content in 202 Jokes of Mulla Nasrudin on Osho - The complete works of Osho

image.title: Osho - The complete works of Osho

item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌CHAPTER 1 During his discourses on the AKSHYA UPANISHAD “This is worth considering. It is significant. The first thing to understand is that except for man, no animal is capable of laughter. So laughter shows a very high peak in the evolution of life. If you go out on the street and see a buffalo laughing, you will be scared to death. And if you report it, then nobody will believe that it can happen.
